aiAssistantPage.title: Email Organization Preferences
aiAssistantPage.subtitle: Customize how AI understands and organizes your emails based on your professional needs.

emailCategories.tooltip: Have a conversation with AI to explain how you want your emails organized. Perfect for unique workflows and specific preferences.

rules.tooltip: Set up automated rules to handle specific emails, like always marking certain senders as important or moving newsletters to a separate category.

professionalTemplates.title: Professional Templates
professionalTemplates.subtitle: Choose a template that matches your profession. These templates contain pre-configured guidelines based on common email patterns.

detailedGuidelines.title: Detailed Guidelines
detailedGuidelines.subtitle: These guidelines help AI understand how to categorize your emails. Be specific and include examples that reflect your actual email patterns.

important.label: Important Emails
important.description: Describe emails that need immediate attention or are crucial for your work
important.placeholder: Example: Urgent client requests, critical project deadlines, direct messages from your supervisor about immediate tasks...

informative.label: Informative Emails
informative.description: Describe emails that are useful but don't require immediate action
informative.placeholder: Example: Team updates, project progress reports, industry news relevant to your work...

lowPriority.label: Low Priority Emails
lowPriority.description: Describe emails that are not relevant to your work or can be safely ignored
lowPriority.placeholder: Example: Marketing newsletters, social media notifications, promotional offers...

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Developer working on software projects and technical systems
softwareEngineer.important: Critical production issues, urgent pull request reviews, deployment coordination messages, and direct messages from team leads about blocking issues. Example: 'Production database is down' or 'Urgent security patch needed'.
softwareEngineer.informative: Code review requests, sprint planning updates, technical documentation changes, and non-urgent bug reports. Example: 'New feature documentation added' or 'Weekly sprint report'.
softwareEngineer.useless: Marketing emails about development tools, automated CI/CD success notifications, and promotional content about tech conferences. Example: 'Try our new IDE' or 'Build passed successfully'.

itSupport.title: IT Support
itSupport.important: Critical system alerts, urgent tickets, system outages, security incidents. Example: 'Production system down' or 'Security breach detected'.
itSupport.informative: Regular maintenance notifications, system updates, ticket status changes. Example: 'Scheduled maintenance window' or 'Ticket resolution summary'.
itSupport.useless: Security awareness newsletters, vendor promotions, general IT news. Example: 'New security training available' or 'IT vendor showcase'.

teacher.title: Teacher/Professor
teacher.description: Educational professional in K-12 or higher education
teacher.important: Student emergencies, parent conferences, grade submission deadlines, department head directives, classroom incidents requiring immediate attention. Example: 'Student medical emergency during class' or 'Urgent parent meeting request regarding student behavior'.
teacher.informative: Lesson plan submissions, faculty meeting notes, curriculum updates, student progress reports, workshop announcements. Example: 'Next week's department meeting agenda' or 'Quarterly grade submission reminder'.
teacher.useless: Educational product marketing, general school newsletters not affecting your classes, third-party workshop advertisements. Example: 'Buy our new textbook series' or 'General campus events newsletter'.

student.title: Student
student.description: University, college, or continuing education student
student.important: Professor communications, assignment deadlines, exam schedules, registration deadlines. Example: 'Final exam room change' or 'Course registration deadline today'.
student.informative: Course materials, study group updates, campus announcements, academic resources. Example: 'Study group meeting schedule' or 'New course materials posted'.
student.useless: Campus event promotions, submission confirmations, marketing emails. Example: 'Campus store sale' or 'Join student club newsletter'.

nurse.title: Nurse
nurse.important: Patient emergencies, critical lab results, medication errors, emergency team coverage, immediate care needs. Example: 'Code Blue in Ward 3' or 'Critical lab values for Room 204 patient'.
nurse.informative: Shift handover notes, routine patient updates, scheduled training sessions, protocol updates. Example: 'Infection control protocol update' or 'Monthly staff rotation schedule'.
nurse.useless: Medical equipment marketing, general hospital newsletters, non-mandatory conference invites. Example: 'New scrubs catalog' or 'Hospital cafeteria menu'.

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: Team leadership and project management across sectors
manager.important: Urgent team member escalations, critical client issues, 24-hour budget approvals needed, stakeholder emergency communications. Example: 'Team blocked on critical delivery' or 'Client escalation requiring immediate attention'.
manager.informative: Weekly team performance reports, project status updates, resource allocation requests, non-urgent team member feedback. Example: 'Monthly department metrics' or 'Team capacity planning'.
manager.useless: General company newsletters, office maintenance notifications, irrelevant department updates. Example: 'Plant watering schedule' or 'Cafeteria menu updates'.

salesRep.title: Sales Representative
salesRep.description: B2B or B2C sales and business development
salesRep.important: Client requests, deal updates, urgent prospect inquiries, sales target alerts. Example: 'Hot lead requiring immediate follow-up' or 'Client contract pending urgent approval'.
salesRep.informative: Market reports, competitive updates, pipeline status, sales metrics. Example: 'Weekly sales dashboard' or 'New competitive analysis'.
salesRep.useless: Internal newsletters, system notifications, irrelevant product updates. Example: 'Office social event' or 'General industry newsletter'.

lawyer.title: Lawyer
lawyer.important: Court deadlines, client emergencies, filing deadlines, urgent case updates. Example: 'Court filing due today' or 'Client emergency situation'.
lawyer.informative: Legal updates, case law changes, client appointment scheduling, document reviews. Example: 'New case law published' or 'Client meeting notes'.
lawyer.useless: Legal vendor marketing, networking events, general newsletters. Example: 'Law firm social event' or 'Legal software promotion'.

creative.title: Creative Professional
creative.description: Designer, writer, artist, or content creator
creative.important: Client feedback, project deadlines, revision requests, urgent approvals. Example: 'Final artwork approval needed' or 'Urgent content update required'.
creative.informative: Design resources, creative briefs, project updates, style guides. Example: 'Brand guidelines update' or 'New project brief'.
creative.useless: Design tool promotions, industry newsletters, irrelevant training ads. Example: 'Try our new design software' or 'Early bird creative conference'.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Staff
restaurant.description: Restaurant employees including servers, cooks, and managers
restaurant.important: Food safety alerts, equipment breakdowns, staff absences, important reservations requiring immediate attention. Example: 'Refrigeration system failure' or 'Emergency health inspector visit'.
restaurant.informative: Menu changes, staff schedules, inventory, supplier updates. Example: 'Weekly ingredient delivery schedule' or 'New menu item training'.
restaurant.useless: Restaurant equipment marketing, general food industry newsletters, irrelevant supplier catalogs. Example: 'Subscribe to cooking magazine' or 'Random vendor menu promotion'.

beauty.title: Beauty Professional
beauty.important: Client emergencies, supply shortages affecting appointments, equipment breakdowns, scheduling conflicts. Example: 'Water outage affecting today's appointments' or 'Urgent client rescheduling needed'.
beauty.informative: Appointment confirmations, product stock updates, client feedback, trend updates. Example: 'Next week's booking schedule' or 'New product training available'.
beauty.useless: General beauty product marketing, irrelevant industry news, spam promotions. Example: 'General beauty industry newsletter' or 'Random product catalogs'.

smallBusiness.title: Small Business Owner
smallBusiness.important: Supplier delivery issues, POS system outages, security incidents, urgent staff matters. Example: 'Store security alarm triggered' or 'Urgent product recall notice'.
smallBusiness.informative: Sales reports, inventory levels, employee schedules, supplier updates. Example: 'Weekly sales summary' or 'Holiday inventory planning'.
smallBusiness.useless: Unsolicited vendor pitches, general industry newsletters, random marketing materials. Example: 'Subscribe to retail magazine' or 'Random supplier catalog'.

freelance.title: Freelance Professional
freelance.important: Client project deadlines, contract negotiations, payment issues, urgent revision requests. Example: 'Final deliverable needed by end of day' or 'Urgent client feedback requiring immediate attention'.
freelance.informative: Project updates, potential client inquiries, industry opportunities, networking events. Example: 'Project milestone review' or 'Potential client introduction'.
freelance.useless: Platform marketing emails, general freelance newsletters, irrelevant job offers. Example: 'Try our premium freelance tools' or 'Generic networking event invitation'.

fieldTech.title: Field Technician
fieldTech.description: On-site technical support and maintenance professional
fieldTech.important: Emergency repair calls, safety incidents, critical equipment failures, immediate service requests. Example: 'Hospital emergency generator failure' or 'Critical system down requiring immediate attention'.
fieldTech.informative: Maintenance schedules, equipment updates, training materials, service logs. Example: 'Next week's maintenance schedule' or 'New equipment installation guidelines'.
fieldTech.useless: Tool marketing, general industry newsletters, irrelevant training offers. Example: 'Subscribe to tech magazine' or 'Random tool catalog'.

researcher.title: Research Scientist
researcher.important: Lab safety incidents, grant deadlines, critical experiment issues, immediate funding matters. Example: 'Lab safety breach requiring immediate action' or 'Grant submission deadline today'.
researcher.informative: Research results, collaboration opportunities, conference deadlines, publication updates. Example: 'Latest experiment results' or 'Upcoming conference abstract deadline'.
researcher.useless: Lab equipment marketing, general science newsletters, irrelevant conference spam. Example: 'New microscope catalog' or 'Random research journal subscription'.

construction.title: Construction Worker
construction.important: Safety violations, weather impacts on projects, urgent material shortages, equipment failures. Example: 'Site safety violation requiring immediate action' or 'Critical equipment failure on site'.
construction.informative: Project schedules, material deliveries, inspection schedules, site access updates. Example: 'Tomorrow's concrete delivery schedule' or 'Site safety protocol update'.
construction.useless: Construction equipment marketing, general industry newsletters, irrelevant training ads. Example: 'New tool catalog' or 'General construction magazine'.

driver.title: Driver/Delivery Professional
driver.important: Route changes, vehicle issues, delivery emergencies, traffic incidents. Example: 'Vehicle breakdown requiring immediate assistance' or 'Urgent route change due to road closure'.
driver.informative: Schedule updates, maintenance reminders, route planning, fuel logs. Example: 'Next week's delivery schedule' or 'Vehicle maintenance due notice'.
driver.useless: Vehicle sales marketing, general transportation newsletters, irrelevant insurance ads. Example: 'Buy new trucks' or 'Random logistics magazine'.

admin.title: Administrative Professional
admin.important: Executive calendar conflicts, urgent meeting changes, critical document deadlines, office emergencies. Example: 'CEO schedule conflict requiring immediate resolution' or 'Urgent document needed for board meeting'.
admin.informative: Office supply inventory, meeting schedules, filing systems, procedure updates. Example: 'Monthly calendar update' or 'New filing system guidelines'.
admin.useless: Office supply marketing, general admin newsletters, irrelevant software ads. Example: 'New printer catalog' or 'Random office magazine'.

finance.title: Finance Professional
finance.important: Tax deadlines, audit notices, client financial emergencies, reporting errors. Example: 'Critical tax filing deadline today' or 'Urgent audit document request'.
finance.informative: Financial reports, client updates, regulatory changes, software updates. Example: 'Monthly reconciliation reminder' or 'New tax regulation update'.
finance.useless: Financial software marketing, general accounting newsletters, irrelevant training ads. Example: 'Try our new accounting software' or 'Random finance magazine'.
